description:
A man becomes faster than a horse after his mother dies.  A sumo wrestler uses divine help to defeat an opponent. A kappa wants to marry a girl in exchange for his help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Man Who Was Faster Than a Horse / The Incredibly Strong Oni Tayuu / The Kappa and the Gourd
Uma yori mo Hayai Otoko / Kairiki Oni Tayuu / Kappa to Hyoutan
馬よりも速い男 / 怪力鬼太夫 / かっぱとひょうたん
